node.title: Victoria records 1,405 new COVID cases as Omicron exposure forces hundreds into isolation
node.alt: Festive Christmas decorations adorn a sign reading 'sircuit' outside a bar.
node.description: Health officials confirm a person with the Omicron variant attended venues in Fitzroy and Collingwood on Friday night, potentially exposing hundreds of people to the virus, as Victoria records 1,405 new cases overnight.
node.content:
["Hundreds of people have been told to isolate after a person with the Omicron COVID-19 variant attended two busy\u00a0Melbourne bars\u00a0on Friday night.", "Victoria's health department said the positive case attended Sircuit Bar in Fitzroy, between 9pm and midnight on December 10, and then the Peel Hotel in Collingwood until 3am.", "It's estimated around 320 people were at the Peel Hotel\u00a0and 410 people were at Sircuit Bar during those exposure times.", "The health department said anyone who attended the venues must get tested and quarantine immediately.", "Fully vaccinated people must quarantine for seven days, and people who are not fully vaccinated must quarantine for 14 days.", "
Victoria records 1,405 COVID-19 cases
", "The Omicron exposures came as Victoria on Wednesday reported 1,405 new COVID-19 cases and three\u00a0deaths.", "There are now 11,518 active cases of the virus in Victoria, and 608\u00a0people have died during the current outbreak.", "There are 365\u00a0people in hospital with the virus in Victoria, of whom 84\u00a0are in intensive care and 46\u00a0are on a ventilator.", "The health department said a further 44\u00a0people were in ICU but their infections were no longer considered active.", "The health department yesterday confirmed three new cases of the Omicron variant, bringing\u00a0the total number of confirmed cases in the state to six.", "Two of the new Omicron cases were\u00a0on a flight from Dubai from which previous cases were identified.", "Yesterday, genomic sequencing was being carried out on nine other suspected Omicron cases.", "It's not known whether any of those cases are people who attended Sircuit Bar or the Peel Hotel on Friday night.", "", "
Hundreds of people who attended the Peel Hotel on friday night have been told to get tested and isolate.(ABC News: Dana Morse)
", "Drag performer Jacqui Meoff said she had\u00a0to isolate for seven days after performing at Sircuit Bar on Friday night.", "She said the bar had been\u00a0enforcing its COVID safe requirements.", "\"Sircuit is very proactive and their security staff, their bouncers, they make sure everyone does check in on the way in,\" she told ABC Radio Melbourne.", "", "
Why we hear about some COVID-19 variants more than others
"]
